name: CyberRekall
description:
Battle your way through CyberAmpage enemy ships in this 80’s inspired, two-dimensional Cyberpunk shoot’em up! Collect fallen enemy tech to battle for the survival of the android race and team up with another player to defeat the CyberAmpage Corporation!

Meet the game designers:

Cristhian Piraquive - Artist/Programmer

Frances Rosa-Martir - Programmer

Wilmaris Serrano - Artist/Programmer
